com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.text
Class TextRun

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.text.TextRun

public class TextRun
extends Object

TextRun defines the text displayed in TextView with its own specified text style.

Version:
Creation date: 11-06-2008 19:18 EST, Modified date: 11-07-2008 17:39 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)

contains

public boolean contains(int x,
                        int y)
Check if this TextRun contains the specified point.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate to find in the TextView coordinates system
y - The y coordinate to find in the TextView coordinates system
Returns:
True if the given point if in this run. False otherwise.

paint

protected void paint(org.fenggui.render.Graphics g,

Draw the TextRun.

xOff - The x offset.
yOff - The y offset.

prepare

protected void prepare(int xMax,
                       org.fenggui.util.Dimension scratchDimension,
                       org.fenggui.util.Point point)
Prepares this text run of text for word-wrapped stylized display, breaking it down into discrete Substrings that can be drawn easily.

Parameters:
xMax - The wrapping point or the width of the view.
scratchDimension - The dimension which is filled in based xMax.
point - The Point contains the x, y offset that this TextRun starts at. The values in point get replaced with the Point that the next text run should begin at.
